objectdraw
Class AWTFrameCanvas

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Canvas
          objectdraw.AWTDrawingCanvas
              objectdraw.AWTFrameCanvas
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.event.ComponentListener, DrawingCanvas, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.awt.event.WindowListener
public class AWTFrameCanvas
extends AWTDrawingCanvas
implements DrawingCanvas, java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener

AWTFrameCanvas is an extension of AWTDrawingCanvas that creates a Frame and puts an AWTDrawingCanvas inside. It is provided to make it possible to experiment with creating and manipulating graphical objects on a DrawingCanvas under environments like Dr. Java and BlueJ.

Version:
1.1.2 released July 2006
See Also:
AWTDrawingCanvas, DrawingCanvas, Serialized Form
